info.name: JIRA eXtreme Dark
info.description: Dark Theme for Atlassian JIRA. You can combine this theme with Dark Reader Chrome Extension for better results. Filter: - Bright: -10 - Contrast: -20 - Sepia: NO - Gray Scale: +10 More: - Filter: Dynamic Enjoy it!
info.additionalInfo:
